title: Jury Selection To Begin In Trial Of Boston Bombing Suspect
teaser: The trial of Boston Marathon bombing suspect Dzhokhar Tsarnaev begins on Monday, and some 1,200 prospective jurors have been summoned. NPR's Arun Rath speaks with Milton Valencia of the Boston Globe.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
